description: Josh Earnest, the White House press secretary, said President Obama relayed his condolences to the people of France, "our oldest ally," and offered security assistance to President François Hollande.
title: U.S. Offers Security Help to France
title_page: U.S. Offers Security Help to France - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Josh Earnest, the White House press secretary, said President Obama relayed his condolences to the people of France, "our oldest ally," and offered security assistance to President François Hollande.
